definitions.definition: one of the two parts of the body at each side of the neck that join the arms to the rest of the body:
examples: I rested my head on her shoulder.

definitions.definition: the top part of a person's back:
examples: He was about six feet tall with broad shoulders.

definitions.definition: the parts of a piece of clothing that cover the wearer's shoulders:
examples: The shoulders look a little tight. Do you want to try a larger size?

definitions.definition: the part of a bottle that curves out below its opening
